name: Silver Dollar
body:
COME WITH REVERSE, right after the very successful second live abroad in Germany this time (along with bands like Soror Dolorosa, the Salvation AMP and Lotus Feed), they return to their city for another one dynamic gig. They are already having airplay in alternative radio stations abroad and have gained already many followers in dark alternative & goth scene, while their upcoming album (most of which will be presented live in this gig) is already being discussed.

Their sound cannot be easily categorized, it rests firmly in Goth Rock of the last two decades, while using elements from the world of dark electronica, trip hop and ethnic, always maintaining the special dark aesthetic and unique musicality that characterizes them. COME WITH REVERSE are known for their powerful and passionate live performances, which will be obvious to whoever will be in Silver Dollar Music Bar, on Friday 15th of November.

Free Admission
